credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Jacob M. Kaplan
title: Birdcage
medium: Metal wire, sheet metal, gessoed and painted wood
description: Cage in form of a woman in a farthingale skirt and elaborate bodice reminiscent of 17th c. garb; head and hands of polychromed wood.  Cage-as-skirt, formed of metal wire embellished with lace-like looped and coiled wire; headdress and long-sleeved bodice of looped and coiled wire.
name: Birdcage
